song_lyrics: Dhanya sant sujān, Sahajānand bhajanmā man lelīn hai;
Karī achaḷ vivek, ek ṭek ur dhārī rahe so paravīn hai... °ṭek
Jeṇe tan upādhi sarve tyāgī, ur bharam karam granthi bhāngī;
Nahī kām krodh mad lobh kadā, rahe rām nirantar māhī hṛudā;
Dhūn akhanḍ na bhūlat ek ghaḍī, urmāhī alaukik ṭev paḍī;
Jenī sūrati ahonish gagan chaḍī... Dhanya° 3
Nitya Brahmānand ur sukh vāsī, jene aṣhṭ-siddhi nav-nidhi dāsī;
title: Dhanya sant sujān Sahajānand bhajanmā man lelīn hai

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-615: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
